title: For Sale: PSA 2 T206 Willis Piedmont 42
author: MVSNYC

posts.post_title: For Sale: PSA 2 T206 Willis Piedmont 42
posts.post_content:
For Sale, PSA 2 T206 Willis Piedmont 42. A bolder/darker back then is often found on P42's.

Asking [STRIKE]$900[/STRIKE] $775

Please PM if interested, thanks!
Mike
Motivated to sell this card, as I just upgraded to another HOF P42. Reach out to me via PM if interested, thanks!
Bump. If it doesn't sell, then I'll just save it for a future trade. Thanks for looking.
